ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: Welp, my /played times are somewhat unrealistic because I tend to let characters idle a great deal.  My bard - which is the one I have played the most was
ygData.messageBody:
Welp, my /played times are somewhat unrealistic because I tend to let
characters idle a great deal. My bard - which is the one I have played the
most was started in May '99 and has 220 days /played - although like I said,
lots of time idle (fell alseep crossing West Karana or just zoning more
times than I care to recount). But, I login about 6pm on weekdays and stay
till 10pm - sometimes 11 or 12. Weekends, begin around 8am and go, on and
off, til midnight or 2am - with the occasional all-nighter - like last Sat
when our little group killed the PoD in Gfay, rescued a Freeti room wipe
out, then as we were killing the fire giants, saw Ragefire spawn so we
called in a cleric friend and killed a dragon. The monk in our group won a
Cloak of Flames and our warrior won a red dragon scale at 4am when the dust
settled.

And ya, my house is a mess, girl friend moved out a year ago, the lawn needs
mowing, and I order food for delivery way too often. But any zone I enter,
someone invariably sends me a greeting! ;)

Sylly Songsynger
Virtuoso
<this space for rent>
Somewhere on Innoruuk...

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Monday, July 09, 2001 1:21 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm


Wow, you're more of an addict than me, care to add up your playtimes for our
amusement :P
/tease

Halana/Tani
